Incabloc® anti-shock device. Power reserve 3 daysFunctions - Hours, minutes, small seconds, power reserve indicator on the back, seconds resetCase - Diameter 47 mm, polished 18K red gold with removable wire loop strap attachments (patented). Screw-down winding crown personalized OP.Dial - Brown with luminous Arabic numerals and hour markers. Seconds at 9 o’clock, Date at 3 o’clockCrystal - Sapphire, formed of corundum, 1.4 mm thick. Anti-reflective coating. OP personalized leather strap and red gold buckle. Water resistant to 50 meters/ 150 feetPlease note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
